author: Michalis Emmanouil
description: Greece is a nation as famous for its seafaring prowess as it is the Parthenon, so it's perhaps fitting to include Navy rum in this Old Fashioned-style tsipouro-based cocktail from Greek city of Lamia. Vanilla is a brilliant touch in this late-night sipper.
name: Parthenon Old-Fashioned

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
